doc:
Wanda Hawley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wanda_Hawley 0 Wanda Hawley (July 30, 1895 – March 18, 1963) was a veteran American actress of the silent film era. She entered the theatrical profession with an amateur group in Seattle, and later toured the U.S. and Canada as a singer. She co-starred with Rudolph Valentino in the 1922 The Young Rajah, and rose to stardom in a number of Cecil B. DeMille's and director Sam Wood's films. Wanda_Hawley ( July_30_,_1895 – March_18_,_1963 ) was a_veteran_American_actress of the_silent_film_era . She entered the_theatrical_profession with an_amateur_group in Seattle , and later_toured the_U.S. and Canada as a_singer . She co-starred with Rudolph_Valentino in the_1922 The_Young_Rajah , and rose to stardom in a_number of Cecil_B._DeMille 's and director_Sam_Wood 's_films .
